attributes.action: enter dominoes as an official sport for london 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dominoes is a sport which has been around for many years and is centred around the Spirit of the Game. Dominoes stresses sportsmanship and fair play. Competitive play is encouraged, but never at the expense of respect between players, adherence to the rules, and the basic joy of play. I believe Dominos embodies many of the ideals of the Olympics and would be a great addition to the games.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
